timeline.bodyText: This is a really bad idea to store the bus in the view: in a Node/Breaker Voltage level, these buses are calculated automatically, so new buses will be created when the topology changes. For Bus/Breaker Voltage Level, the bus of the bus/breaker view is configured, so it could be OK to keep it, but it's not for the bus view.
